abilities.description: Your combat bot companion fights at your side. When you @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike} aided by the bot, add +1; if you @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.723192c97fec4fe2]{Clash}, take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you use the threat of violence to @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.9f538fabf8998c5b]{Compel} or @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.3f5a834fa3fea5d1]{Gain Ground} while the bot brings its weapons to bear, you may roll +its health. If you do, take +1 momentum on a hit. On a strong hit with a match, the bot's display is especially persuasive; take another +1 momentum.

Once per fight, when you @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.d9208f9b7d827aec]{React Under Fire} by using the bot to draw fire or create a diversion, roll +its health. On a strong hit, mark progress. On a weak hit, face the cost as normal, but then you are in control.
